sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import moment from 'moment'; import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { GET_ORDERS } from 'graphql/query/order.query'; import { CURRENCY } from 'utils/constant'; import ErrorMessage from 'components/error-message/error-message'; import OrderReceivedWrapper, { OrderReceivedContainer, OrderInfo, OrderDetails, TotalAmount, BlockTitle, Text, InfoBlockWrapper, InfoBlock, ListItem, ListTitle, ListDes, } from './your-plants.style'; import { FormattedMessage, useIntl } from 'react-intl'; import { GET_LOGGED_IN_USER } from 'graphql/query/customer.query'; type YourPlantsProps = { data?: any; index?: Number; Router?: any; }; const YourPlants: React.FunctionComponent = (props) => { const router = useRouter(); const intl = useIntl(); const { data, error, loading } = useQuery(GET_LOGGED_IN_USER); if (loading) { return }; console.log(data) if (error) { return ( ); }; const printHandler = () =>{ if (typeof window !== 'undefined') { window.print() } } console.log('data', data?.getUser?.plants) // const dateAndTime = `${moment(myOrder?.datetime).format('MM/DD/YY')}, ${moment(myOrder?.datetime).format('hh:mm A')}`; const userPlants = data?.getUser?.plants; return ( {/* {myOrder?.order_code} {dateAndTime} {CURRENCY}{myOrder?.total} */} {myOrder?.order_products?.length} {myOrder?.delivery_method?.details} {myOrder?.delivery_date} {myOrder?.delivery_address} {CURRENCY}{myOrder?.sub_total} {myOrder?.payment_method} {CURRENCY}{myOrder?.total} ); }; export default YourPlants;
